Discount.sub_header: The more you pay up-front, the more you save.  You save the most when you pay your policy in-full.
Discount.faq: Get this discount on your auto policy when you pay more of your premium up front. The bigger your down payment, the bigger your discount.
Discount.description: The more you pay up-front, the more you save. Get this discount on your auto insurance policy when you pay more of your premium up front. The larger your down payment, the greater your discount.
Get this discount if you belong to any of the groups affiliated with the [Kemper Direct/Teachers/Partnership Direct] family of companies

We think happy couples make good drivers and deserve a discount. And for any couples who are less than happy, perk up - you get this discount, too. Marriages, as well as legally recognized civil unions and domestic partnerships qualify.

Discount.sub_header: We like rewarding good driving.  If you are continuously insured for at least 12 months, you save when you don't have any accidents or moving violations for at least three years.
Discount.description: We like to reward good driving. You get this discount if you have been continuously insured for 12 months or more, and you haven't had any chargeable accidents or violations during the past three years.

Discount.sub_header: Save just for switching to us.  We'll reward your past loyalty to your previous carrier based on how long you were with them.
Discount.description: Save money just for switching to {CompanyName}. With this discount, we reward your loyalty to your previous carrier based on how long you were with them. Retro never looked so good.
Get this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy. This is just one of the many ways we reward our loyal customers.
Get this discount for vehicles equipped with qualifying passive restraint equipment, such as automatic seatbelts.
If your vehicle's safety equipment includes airbags, you may qualify for a discount off your policy.
Get this discount if your vehicle is equipped with a device that will help prevent theft losses.
Get this discount if you are age 55 or older, have recently completed a state-approved accident prevention course, and do not have any chargeable accidents or violations.

Discount.faq: Get this discount on your auto policy when you pay more of your premium up front. The bigger your down payment, the bigger your discount.
Discount.description: The more you pay up-front, the more you save. Get this discount on your auto insurance policy when you pay more of your premium up front. The larger your down payment, the greater your discount.
Get this discount if you belong to any of the groups affiliated with the [Kemper Direct/Teachers/Partnership Direct] family of companies

We think happy couples make good drivers and deserve a discount. And for any couples who are less than happy, perk up - you get this discount, too. Marriages, as well as legally recognized civil unions and domestic partnerships qualify.

Discount.sub_header: We like rewarding good driving.  You save just for being insured without any accidents or moving violations for at least 12 months.
Discount.description: We like to reward good driving. So, you get this discount if you have been continuously insured without any accidents or moving violations during the past 12 months.

Discount.sub_header: Save just for switching to us.  We'll reward your past loyalty to your previous carrier based on how long you were with them.
Discount.description: Save money just for switching to {CompanyName}. With this discount, we reward your loyalty to your previous carrier based on how long you were with them. Retro never looked so good.
Get this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy. This is just one of the many ways we reward our loyal customers.

Discount.sub_header: You'll save for coming back!  If you rejoin the {CompanyName} family, you'll get extra savings for an entire year!
Discount.description: Welcome back is for previous policyholders.

Discount.sub_header: You'll save for coming back!  If you buy a policy now, you'll get extra savings your first year with us.
Discount.description: Come Back and Save is for return quoters.

Discount.sub_header: This discount is automatically applied when you buy a homeowner's or Renter's policy with {CompanyName} Homeowners Insurance Program
Discount.description: This discount is automatically applied when you buy a homeowner's or Renter's policy with {CompanyName} Homeowners Insurance Program
This discount may lower your rate if you have successfully completed an approved defensive driver or similar accident prevention course.

Discount.sub_header: You may qualify for this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy.
Discount.description: You may qualify for this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy.

Discount.sub_header: Your quote includes a special 6% discount* for agreeing to focus your attention on the road and drive safely. View The Pledge
Discount.faq: You may qualify for this discount by signing a pledge to commit to being a focused driver.
Discount.description: You may qualify for this discount by signing a pledge to commit to being a focused driver.

Discount.faq: You may qualify for this discount if you own a home, condominium or mobile home and are the primary driver on your automobile insurance policy.
Discount.description: You may qualify for this discount if you own a home, condominium or mobile home and are the primary driver on your automobile insurance policy.

Discount.sub_header: This discount is automatically applied when you buy a homeowner's or Renter's policy with Kemper Direct Homeowners Insurance Program
Discount.description: This discount is automatically applied when you buy a homeowner's or Renter's policy with {CompanyName} Homeowners Insurance Program

Discount.faq: This discount may lower your rate if you have successfully completed an approved defensive driver or similar accident prevention course.
Discount.description: This discount may lower your rate if you have successfully completed an approved defensive driver or similar accident prevention course.

Discount.sub_header: You may qualify for this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy.
Discount.description: You may qualify for this discount when you insure more than one vehicle on the same policy.

Discount.faq: E-signature from {CompanyName} eliminates paperwork by allowing you to electronically sign your policy documents. Now you can receive a $50 discount off your policy's first term and $25 off your first renewal term when you electronically sign your documents and have a valid e-mail account.
Discount.description: E-signature from {CompanyName} eliminates paperwork by allowing you to electronically sign your policy documents. Now you can receive a $50 discount off your policy's first term and $25 off your first renewal term when you electronically sign your documents and have a valid e-mail account.
